m_szDocTitle: Video: This 3D-Printed Car Is the World's First
m_szDocSumamry: By Mimi Li , Epoch Times | September 18, 2014 Last Updated: September 18, 2014 9:21 pm   Of all the things you can have 3D printed, add an electric car to the list. Watch above as the world’s first-ever 3D printed automobile is made from the ground up in one piece. Local Motors, the auto manufacturer behind the Strati, which is Italian for “layers,” said the mostly carbon fiber and plastic car took only 44 hours and less than 50 parts to assemble. For its debut at the International Manufacturing Technology Show (IMTS) 2014 in Chicago on September 13, the golf-cart sized two-seater was driven a
